content.detailedDescription:
At about 8pm on september the 19th, 2009, i was outside talking to my neighbor across the street.  i noticed out of the corner of my eye, this brightness in the sky, bright enough to catch my attention.  i looked at it directly and said to my neighbor....Oh my, do you see what i see?  she said "oh my god".....  it was a very bright sphere looking object that was sitting there hovering in the sky.  there was no sound as far as we(people) could hear.  this night was absolutely cloudless and dark except for the stars in the sky.  it had a beam shining down from under it that looked like an upside down flashlight coming from it, but this light never touched the ground.  then...It formed this misty cloud around it.  it then wobbled or spun so that it was brighter and a little less bright, this is how i knew it was wobbling.  while this was happening, it almost seemed to take a shape, kind of boomeranging or bending from sphere to boomerang.  after this and right after this....The light went away instantly as if it tore a hole in the sky and went in.  the mist remained for about 10 seconds or so....Then disappeared itself.  i know what i saw....And i am certain that the government will cover it up with some story.  unlike other counties that tell the truth to there people, our government chooses to lie as if we are all children and can't handle the truth.......I would love to be contacted by professionals if i'm needed.  this is incredible and does answer some questions for me but makes me want more....
john
content.summary: Strong white bright light with cone shaped light shining down under it...Not touching the ground.....

content.detailedDescription:
There was no object above the hotel when i made this photo,it was a clear day
only after down loading the photos did i see this object. the photos that when taken before and after do not show this object.There was three photos taken and only one shows this object, all the photos where taken with in seconds of each other.We where traveling down highway 101 southbound and i thought it would be nice to take some photos of the hotel only to find out later that there was an object above the hotel in one of the photos.
content.summary: Ufo above hotel

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down rail trail from dunstable to pepperell i was about unquittynesstte brook it was just getting dark when i saw a bright light for about 10 sec. i looked up and the light was gone it folded up on it self , but the beam was still there so i watched this beam of light with no source for a while no air craft in the area , i got to my friends house i didnt say any thing yo anyone and then i heard a friend tim talking about this light he saw i was shocked we talked about this and we saw the same thing at the same time in different locations he was standing in bubs yard looking towards the river and i was on the other side of the river looking at the object i would have never said any thing until tim said somthing and it was like i forgot until he had mentioned the sighting to me it looked like a search light from a helicopter but with no copter no sound . the crickets and the peepers got quiet
content.summary: Walking down the trail it was just getting dark when i saw a bright light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend laura and i were on our way home from waukegan, illinois.  i cannot recall the exact day or month, i only know it was some time in 1979.  we had been out at a night club (but were not intoxicated).  it was about 4:30 a.M. and we had just crossed the illinois/wisconsin border traveling on highway 31 (or green bay road) in kenosha county near springbrook road.  either laura or myself spotted something in the sky.  i was driving and i pulled my car to the side of the road and bother her and i got out of the car and stood in the road looking up.  in the sky in the southeast side of the horizon was a large round light about the same size as a full moon, but much brighter (sort of if you were looking up at one of our spacecraft when it is first taking off).  it was not moving in any direction, it just hovered in one spot.  laura and i were totally amazed and could not believe what we were seeing.  other cars and stopped also  but i don't recall how many.  we just stood there in the middle of green bay road watching this object in the sky wondering what it was.  all of a sudden it started moving, slowly at first.  not horizontally like an airplane moves, but upwards.  all of a sudden it turned into a very bright light almost like looking at the sun and one second it was there and the next it was gone.  poof!  although we did not actually see anything mechanical like a flying saucer, etc., there had to have been something behind the light that was creating it.  afterward we just kept talking about it and how unbelievable it was. i remember feeling very excited.  now it is the year 2009.  i have not seen laura for awhile, but if i were to and asked her if she remembered she would say yes!  at the time i thought that if it had been a ufo maybe they were just observing and checking out our power plant. the pleasant prairie power plant was fairly new.  back then there were lights all over the place and i can imagine what it must have looked like from up above.
content.summary: A bright round light in the sky that was hovering  then slowly started moving upward vertically until it vanquished.

content.detailedDescription:
I did not witness this in person, i heard this on a tv station called lbc, i didnt get the time of the event, they had a tv show and one of the guests was a female who said she witnessed an object in the sky in an area called batroon located in the northern parts of lebanon, circular in shape and had beamed light on her, she was very frightened and she said that the object emitted 4 beams of light all directed downwards, another witness said that the ufos were more than a dozen in number, some people who attended a theater there went outside and witnessed the event, we are still waiting for something tonight over beirut itself since a guy by the name of mike feghali who has a tv show on a local tv station called o tv, predicted that ufos will appear over beirut tonight sep 21st 2009, we will keep an eye on the news since i'm working outside lebanon so i can't physically be there, if such an incident will happen and is reported, i will record it and have it sent directly, i hope it does.

ps: about 3 days ago local tv stations have reported that 8 israeli jet fighters were seen over the sky in lebanon, i don't know if this is related but i wonder if they had seen these ufos on their radar screen and have scrambled these jets to check what were they, as i said this was 3 or maybe 4 days ago before this incident, 8 jets is a high number usually they send 2 or 3 max since lebanon is a small country
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple ufo sigting in batroon area in lebanon

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were enjoying the beautiful night this past friday and were outside in my backyard. behind us are woods, or a full section of land that is not occupied by homes. we were talking and a brilliant white object that was pulsating red caught my eye. it was in the tree line, but off to a distance, say 1/4 mile away. it was wobbly, but moved up and down and side to side. it moved in a way normal aircraft cannot. what struck my attention is the red, pulsating lights. it was more like a strobe light going from brilliant white to red.
content.summary: Bright object pulsating red lights and changing directions

content.detailedDescription: My friend laura and i were on our way home from waukegan, illinois.  i cannot recall the exact day or month, i only know it was some time in 1979.  we had been out at a night club (but were not intoxicated).  it was about 4:30 a.M. and we had just crossed the illinois/wisconsin border traveling on highway 31 (or green bay road) in kenosha county near springbrook road.  either laura or myself spotted something in the sky.  i was driving and i pulled my car to the side of the road and bother her and i got out of the car and stood in the road looking up.  in the sky in the southeast side of the horizon was a large round light about the same size as a full moon, but much brighter (sort of if you were looking up at one of our spacecraft when it is first taking off).  it was not moving in any direction, it just hovered in one spot.  laura and i were totally amazed and could not believe what we were seeing.  other cars and stopped also  but i don't recall how many.  we just stood there in the middle of green bay road watching this object in the sky wondering what it was.  all of a sudden it started moving, slowly at first.  not horizontally like an airplane moves, but upwards.  all of a sudden it turned into a very bright light almost like looking at the sun and one second it was there and the next it was gone.  poof!  although we did not actually see anything mechanical like a flying saucer, etc., there had to have been something behind the light that was creating it.  afterward we just kept talking about it and how unbelievable it was. i remember feeling very excited.  now it is the year 2009.  i have not seen laura for awhile, but if i were to and asked her if she remembered she would say yes!  at the time i thought that if it had been a ufo maybe they were just observing and checking out our power plant. the pleasant prairie power plant was fairly new.  back then there were lights all over the place and i can imagine what it must have looked like from up above.
content.summary: A bright round light in the sky that was hovering  then slowly started moving upward vertically until it vanquished.

content.detailedDescription: Large ufo with very bright light illuminating entire object (brighter than a star) caught my eye while i got up to get a drink in the kitchen. i put my glasses on and saw it hovering below the tree line with tentacle looking lights dropping from it. the craft bobbed slowly up/down, side/side. i have a pair of night vision goggles and went to get them to take a close look at the craft. when i returned, it had moved into the trees. i waited a bit and it bobbed back into my non-obstructed vision. i looked through the goggles and that is when i really saw the tentacle looking lights dropping from the craft. needless to say, i had a difficult time returning to sleep after seeing that!
content.summary: large ufo with very bright light inside of it illuminating entire object

content.detailedDescription: Short description says about everthing. please contact me by e mail for specifics. thank you.
content.summary: Fireball heading upward at 45 degee angle to northeast

content.detailedDescription: There were three of us at a campfire outside the eastern edge of buffalo ny. surrounded by trees except for one spot where we could see a bright star in the sky.  at about 10:26pm i looked into the sky and just to the right of the star i saw a round or spherical light that had a cone shaped glowing beam below it. i remember thinking it must be some kind of light shining through the clouds. i pointed and said "what is that?" to my friends, and they were already looking. the light made no movements at all, and no sound. we watched and it slowly went out, starting at the lowest part of the cone, also the largest part, almost like it was retracting back into the source. then it went out, it looked to me like the clouds had simply moved into the veiw of the light to cover it. we still did not see any movment or hear any sound, and there were not any clouds. the whole time was only about thirty seconds, and looked to be very far away, and maybe a little to high in the air for a helicopter. the light that it shined was extremely bright but not blinding, and i don't understand how it could be motionless, with no sound, and still seem so bright. all three of us saw it, and could not stop watching. it was amazing
content.summary: Spherical light with cone shape glowing mist. remained motionless. light slowly vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in nagasaki for an holiday and took a short movie with my digital camera from nagasaki hotel about 15 floors up.
i noticed later as i reviewed the movie what appears to be an object a few seconds into the footage, you will notice it in the middle. 
of course i realise i am behind glass and that it can reflect whats behind me or a chip in the glass maybe.
i am sending you the raw footage, no alterations has been made, i'm hoping you can work out what it is as i dont have any editing software and means to analyze it myself.
thankyou
terry mchiggins
content.summary: Possible ufo in nagasaki japan

content.detailedDescription:
i never had an interest in ufos until i saw one here in montana. the year was 1976. the following year, 1977, i purchased a helium neon laser, and signaled the various objects operating in the sky. the objects reacted instantly to the laser beam. they would slow down, hover, change direction and fly directly over my position. there was an explosion of activity that summer. i never have seen so many craft operating in the sky, at low altitude,  before or since. a huge hemispherical shaped craft flew directly over my position at low altitude. the outer surface was completely smooth. no engineering features, whatsoever. as if the craft was cast as a solid. it had a white metallic surface. there was a faint white glow, emanating outward from the surface, equally over the entire surface area of the craft. it travelled in an absolutely straight, and stabilized, horizontal orientation, and trajectory. it made a powerful low frequency roaring sound, as it flew overhead. that is the one, and only time, i heard sound coming from a craft. all the others were silent. this craft was different than any other craft i���ve seen. words can���t adequately describe what i felt and experienced, during that fantastic instant, in space and time. advanced technology!!!! whewwwww. this is what the craft looked like.

sincerely, 

darryl broome
content.summary: Read the detailed description.

content.detailedDescription:
i received a text from my on and off again girlfriend. it must of been about 7 or 8p.M. when she texted me. she sent me a few texts that i didn't respond too, but the last one was far too enticing not to respond too. she wrote "there's a space ship near my back yard."
      i thought this was a joke to get me to come over to see her but we did encounter a u.F.O. maybe 5 months before hand that was like a jet but it was vibrant yellow, moved so slow, and made no sound. that one looked identical to the old toy model of the roswell u.Fo. i decided i'd bring my laptop & webcam just in case. when i got there i asked her if it was one of the stars in the sky that i was pointing too. she said no and led me to her back porch. 
        about 2 miles away just above the trees & above the mountainside there was a circular red light. it didn't even seem to move. so i hooked up my webcam and tried to adjust the visual. unluckily it wouldn't capture anything more then around 100 yards away. my camera on my phone is broken & my girlfriend couldn't find her moms camera that she uses occasionally. we looked for her camera for about 10  minutes. nothing. 
     at that moment i was excruciatingly frustrated because i saw a u.F.O. that was maybe 100 feet above my back yard and now i'm seeing one in my girlfriends backyard and i couldn't capture it with anything. i opened the door and peeked out side again. now it was below the tree line. i stared at it for a good minute and it didn't move at all. i was mad. i closed the door and decided to watch the movie "point break". about an hour later i looked outside again and it was still there but now there was a large amount of red light to the right of the craft and it was pitch-black outside. the light looked like it went all through out the trees but only in the area directly beside the craft. the crafts light around it seemed to intensify a little as well. seeing the large amount of the light beside the craft made me shut the door. it was just too bizarre. i finished watching the movie then looked outside again. i thought it was gone. but my girlfriend said no look closely. i stared for maybe 10 seconds to get a good focus & now there where 2 lights that where extremely small and maybe 2 football fields apart. i was still extremely mad because i wanted to capture the object on some kind of film but i didn't. i left her house last night then i just asked her if it was still there a few hours ago. she said no, it's gone. i'm going to buy a camcorder that has decent focus as soon as i get a few dollars in case something like this ever happens again. so far in the past 2 years i've seen 2 real bizarre u.F.Os and 3 or 4 others that weren't as scary.
content.summary: Night time abnormal space craft behind girlfriends back yard.

content.detailedDescription: I was listening to my ipod with headphones in, upstairs at my desk. i had the window open and then i heard and felt, even through the headphones, what i knew to be a jet (f-15) flyby at a fairly low altitude at 9:20 pm. i threw off my headphones and ran down stairs and grabbed my jacket and went out the front door. standing in the driveway of my apartment building, facing west, i saw four big bright red lights in a row, horizontally. there was a small white light that was flashing on and off over to the side a bit. the craft was not traveling as fast as a f-15 would, but proceeded to fly at a moderate speed towards me. i watched it fly over head (90 degrees) and saw between seven to nine red lights in a triangular formation underneath this craft. i was confused by what i was seeing because i have never seen a craft that had that kind of light configuration before. as it went over me, i could hear the roar of an engine but not what an f-15 would sound like. i watched it travel in the ese direction before i lost it in the trees. the sighting lasted about a minute and a half. i stayed outside for another 5 minutes, but saw nothing else unusual.
content.summary: Multiple red lights made a triangle under an object

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on bell road at approximately 3:15pm today (sunday, oct 20, 2009) i saw what looked like the video posted below.  at first i thought the large object was a bunch of balloons tied together but as i stared at it, it became clear it was somthing more.  upon turning on my computer tonight, i noted google was showing a cartoon ufo so i did a google search of ufo's on news and found this video.  it's what i saw today.  has anyone else in phoenix reported this?  

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=yyiysv5auak&feature=player_embedded
content.summary: Vertical rectangular craft, slightly more slender in the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
There were five of us sitting on the front steps of rowans house when i, matthew, noticed an object in the western sky just above the tree line that was unusual. the color was orange and flared in intensity, and the shape was that of ball, except when the colors flashed (or varied in intensity), where in the shape expanded, but still remained ball shaped.
we were sitting at a house on chicago street in elgin, il at dusk smoking cigarettes and cigars chatting about our day when i expressed that i was unable to identify the object and indicated to the other people where i was looking. nothing specifically caused me to look for the object, but as a person who regularly watches planes overhead, i often find myself looking up.
rowan was the first to come off the porch and immediately expressed to lily to retrieve his camera, next off the porch was bethany and our other friend. they stepped down off the porch to see what i was looking at and we all expressed that none of us could identify the light as any kind of aircraft that we recognized.
we continued to watch the object as it moved in both lateral and vertical movements that were not indicative of aircraft or hot air balloons. the sky was light enough to see well, but the light of the object did not allow us to see any structure. the sun was below the horizon on the far side of the object from us and there was no light source that would have cause reflection against an object in the sky. there was no sound.
distance was hard to identify, but the object likely moved towards us and then receded as the size changed from smaller, to larger and then smaller again as it appeared to move away. speed also was not able to be estimated as the object was only visible for about 2 and a half minutes before it was gone from view. however comparing it to standard known aircraft it took about half the time a normal aircraft does to recede from view. there were no other aircraft visible at the time of this sighting.
lily returned with the camera, and rowan attempted to photograph the object. with his 12 mega-pixel camera two shots recorded the image, one showed a ball approximately 10 pixels across, the other which was shot with at a slowed down speed, showed some shaking and ghosting from the shooter, but also showed a distinct light trail.
after the object was no longer visible we talked about it and the fact that it qualified as a real ufo as non of us were able to identify it. we were all glad that there were multiple people there to witness it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange ball of light with intensity variations

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:22 pm sept 20th was outside skywatching as usual. my boyfriend and i both saw this happen.I prayed for a week he would see something, his eyes are not as sharp as mine so i prayed for a bright light to show up for him. it appeared in the no. sky about 1/4 way up from the so. skyline ,dimly lit, a orb trying to be a star, amber color, when it was half way across the sky it stopped and flared up very bright, (dime sz. if the moon is a silver dollar). a very white light, 10 times the size of the brightest star and just as brillant. it then moved a little further so. then disappeared. a few min. later at 8:28 reappeared overhead wavering as if to wave good-bye then dissapeared again. my feeling was it was a special sighting because i prayed for it and also it came right after flashing a flashlite in the sky while thinking these thoughts. i felt it was showing the love :) and a promise of a better future.  well its a nice thought even tho it may not be the case. the timeing was perfect tho. my boyfriend was very happy as well and commented he was now a believer and had never seen anything like it. he has some pilot experience and stated it could no way have been any lind of regular aircraft.A small note here he had a bad headache before seeing this and after.
also before the flareing orb i saw orbs at 5:40 am, 7:28pm, 8:12pm, and 1 other after the event at 8:35 which went no. then ne then no again avoiding a plane but keeping its semi-bright light where most of the time i see them disappear.
i would love to hook up with others here in las vegas that are shareing their experiences, if any. one other note, i tried to take a picture with my phone camera but it didn`t come out good enough, still working on getting that night film!
content.summary: Star like orb shines its light bright then dissapears, reappears overhead and disappears again.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my cousins house when i looked up to see if i could see another ufo similar to the 1 i saw on the 2nd of sept. it was a bright color alternating ufo changing color between orange and blueish color. it also would shape shift from 3 small orbs to 1 solid orb. its almost becoming routine it seems for me to see these objects flying around in the sky.
content.summary: Bright color alternating ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street with a friend in humansville when i noticed what looked like an unusual cell tower with pulsating lights. i then realized that the lights were moving slowly in a northerly direction toward clinton and warrensburg.Upon closer examination, it appeared to be a triangular shaped black craft with 3 white lights, one near each corner. the lights slowly pulsated simaltaneously, dim and then bright. the craft seemed as if it could be a mile to 1/2 mile a way and appeared to be about the size of a football field. i watched with interest until the object past behind the trees and out of our view. by the time the object was out of sight it was viewed by three people including myself that i know of. this sighting happened during a festival but our position was at least a block away from the festivities and other attendees.
content.summary: Slow moving black trangle shaped craft with slowly pulsating white lights at the corners.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my driveway one night.There was a summer storm coming in with lightning,but no rain as yet. i looked skyward and saw a round object flying silently completely below the clouds. it had about 16 white lights around it. they did not rotate or blink. the actual object was invisible except during lightning strikes. then it appeared clearly as a circular dark object. now we have the largest c-130 base in the country about 50 miles away and anyone around here sees dozens of them a day. using the familier aircraft as a reference my judgements are;          the craft was maybe 1/2 to 2/3 in diameter the wingspan of a c-130. it flew considerably slower than a c-130. its altitude could not have been over 2000ft and i feel that it was half that.

my mother also witnessed the event. the ufo flew from n to s with no deviation in course or speed. it disapeared over the horizen. i was excited. my mom and i both knew that what we had seen was a ufo.
content.summary: Round object silently flew overhead during a thunderstorm. 16 or so white unblinking lights were arayed around it.

content.detailedDescription:
When reviewing the photograph i noticed the object under the funnel cloud.
when i snapped the shot it was of the signage located in lafayette, indiana on creasy lane east of sr 38 about 500 yards from a construction sites main drive on the west side of the road. the photograph is viewed from south to north. and i did not notice the funnel cloud or the object at the time, my mind was on the signage.
i question to you did the object drop from the funnel cloud?
did it cause the cloud?
just for your eyes.
content.summary: Found on photograph

content.detailedDescription: I was staying at my sons house who lives in monroe, ny. i did not sleep to well and was restless all night i woke up and looked at the clock it was  4:00 a.M. i got up out of bed and looked out the window and marveled at all the stars so clear in the sky (living in the city i dont see that very much)thats when i noticed a cone shaped object, it was stationary and seemed to have a cloud around it and also a hint of lights which seemed obscured. it was the strangest thing i ever seen. i knew something was there but i couldnt quite make it out. every time my eyes glanced away from it for a second and then came back to try an focus better was this hint of lights around the cone shape object. i must have watch for about 5 minutes or so and at no time did it move. i was getting a little nervous about what i was seeing i didnt want to watch anymore and tried to go back to sleep. all day long ive wondered what it was that i saw.
content.summary: Cone shaped object , stationary

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8:00pm on 9/19/of 09 i was playing soccer in my back yard with my cousins and one of my friends i was the goallie of my team and everyone was on the other side of the yard.What cought my attention was a mist like substance the shape of a triangle i started to look closer at it for about 15 seconds and above the mist there was a bright light above it.I thought it was a helocopter but it was to high and it was not moving.It seemed like the mist was attached to the bright light,the mist was getting bigger as i was looking at it.I called my cousins and my friend over but by the time they got over the bright light above the mist dissapeared within a second.When they came the mist was still there for about 20 seconds and slowley the mist started to get narrower as time was passing.The mist looked like it was getting sucked up by something but i dont know what im assuming it was the bright light that dissapeared.I lost sight of the object because it dissapeared.After all this happend i felt shocked because i never seen anything like it and when i was talking about it i was shaking.That is the sighting i seen in wich i think is not from this world
content.summary: Bright light with a triange mist under the light

content.detailedDescription:
I dont know what it was but it looked like a star and then it was moving 
me and my girlfriend went outside on our back porch and i looked up [like i always do, always trying to see a ufo but never have] and noticed what looked like a star moving kinda slowly and i told my girlfriend to look at it and she was surprised to. and we watched it for about a minute and it just dissapeared almost like all lights just went off, not like it flew away. dont know if it was a military project or something else. but why have a military test over boise id. i dont know if its even interesting to you or not but there it is.      p.S. you guys are awesome if you ever need help with anything please ask. thanx
content.summary: Dissapearing light

content.detailedDescription:
We have a cottage on grand traverse bay, at old mission, mi.  vacationing for labor day weekend, friday night, we were at a beach bonfire with some other neighbors.  at the beach were myself, my wife, three kids age ranges 9-11, two neighbors.

i noticed a glowing orange ball of light basically floating in toward us at tree top level, moving slowly west to east.  i pointed it out to the gathering, and it moved right past us, over the water, even lighting up the water below.  we were all rather astounded as to what it could be.  my son got frightened and ran into the cottage.  

at first i thought it was some kind of weird firework on a balloon, but the ball of light did not flicker or drop sparks as a firework would, did not zig or zag, just moved in a smooth directionally straight line, but was gradually gaining altitude.  there was zero wind that night.  it just kept on heading in the same direction, out over the lake toward elk rapids.

it was a perfect sphere of orange light, fire color, made no sound, and very faintly above it appeared to be a dark red dome.  then suddenly the light simply disappeared out over the lake.
content.summary: Orange ball in the sky near traverse city, mi, sept 4

content.detailedDescription: 7 friends and i stopped our night game of night football because one had pointed out an abnormally wide plane-like movement of low lights in the sky. horizontally the light colors were red, blue, red, spread out wider than ever seen before, but clearly all apart of the same object. it was flying east directly above us at the speed of a regular plane. some of us got excited, but others brushed it aside as just some kind of air plane. a minute later when the object is directly above us, it  vanishes, only to reappear a second later in a different spot along it's path as a huge, filled in, white, triangle. it was an awkward shaped triangle, bowing downward at the bottom and inward at the sides. it was all glowing in a blurry way. but it was the circle at the top point of the triangle that was the main focal point. it was like a huge, bright ball of cotton. we all stood in the street, staring up, amazed. all was silent. the entire figure became more and more blurry for the 10 seconds that we saw it. then it disappeared into the darkening night. it was just to the right of (what is believed to be) the north star. and further left of that was the pinkish glow/aurora from new york city.(40 miles east of sparta). 3 friends pulled out their phones to take pictures of the huge phenomenon in the sky, but it wouldn't come up on anyones phone. we then all looked at each other establishing that we all indeed saw the same thing. as a bunch off teenage kids, we were both nervous and scared. it made my nerves tingle and my eyes watery when i thought about it.
content.summary: Blurry white circle atop a bowed triangle fading

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were on the access road at the bottom of triangular field in the gettysburg national park.  i am a paranormal investigator, we were doing some experiments and recordings, etc.  i was taking radom photos of different areas.  he told me to look over in his direction and up in the sky.  the sky was very, very clear and stars visible.  i noticed a black/gray cloudy area and suddenly, a cone-shaped beam of light came from this area in the sky shining on the ground.  he saw a triangular shape in the sky where the beam of light was coming from.  we did not hear a sound coming from this.  the normal sounds of insects, etc. was not audible.  this was not a normal beam of light that could be associated with a helicopter, airplane, etc.  i wanted to take photos but, i couldn't move my arms.  i was totally mesmerized by this beam of light.  the beam of light suddenly retracted straight up towards this triangle shape in the sky and disappeared into this black/gray area.  the sky cleared and it was gone. 

we are still scratching our heads over this one.  my boyfriend was actually looking at what he thought was a very bright star when this appeared and he called my attention to it.  the beam of light did not move either.  it was focused on something on the ground.

today, i was listening to my recordings and there seems to be about 3 mins. of recordings missing.  i can't explain it, i just know they are gone for no reason.  we are still talking about this incident.  my friend called me this evening to tell me that her oldest daughter and nephew saw the same thing in west baltimore.

the first photo was taken during the day when we were leaving fairfield, pa. heading back to gettysburg.  the second was the only photo i could get, it's not a good one.  i will say this, i am a paranormal investigator and am an objective one at that.  i scrutinize evidence over and over.  i've seen and experienced many things but, nothing like this ever.
content.summary: Triangle shape, very, very bright cone shaped beam

content.detailedDescription: We were returning to our camp after fishing in a boat. the object was spotted by someone in the boat. we had no idea what we were looking at. the object was in the southern sky. it did not seem to be moving but our boat was moving so it was hard to tell. the object was a oval white circle with a white cone at the bottom. it also seemed to be misty or in a cloud but the night was clear and crisp. a couple of minutes after we noticed it the light, it just dimmed and we could not see it any more. another group that was returning from another location on the lake saw the same thing. my first impression was a comet but the direction and size of the cone i knew it was not a comet.We were all pretty mater of fact about the siting after when talking about it that we had no idea what we saw and it could be something from the americian space program or something we just can't explain.
content.summary: A light with a cone shape below  it

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8 pm on saturday 9/19/09, my wife and i were on the front deck of our house in sea isle city, nj when we both witnessed a bright white light in the southeast sky over the ocean approximatley 45 degrees off the horizon.  the light appeared larger than any star visible in the clear sky, and was much larger than a light typically seen on an aircraft.  at best, it might have been the size of a helicopter search light, but there was no sound to indicate that any such craft was in the vicinity.  the light then reflected a cone-shaped aura, shining downward for approximately 10 seconds.  a mist then developed first below, then surrounding the light source.  the light then gradually dissipated (~5 seconds), disappearing while the mist remained visible for approximately 2 minutes.  there were no clouds in the otherwise clear sky.

we both questioned whether/not we might have witnessed a ufo....Not certain of what else it could have been....I later reasoned that it might have been a distress flair from a ship, but there were no such reports that we could find in that locale. we were surprised to find, however, a number of similar reports of sightings along the east coast and middle atlantic states around the same time.
content.summary: Large bright white cone-shaped light shining downward over ocean south east of sea isle city

content.detailedDescription:
We looked up in the sky,  the sky was clear with no clouds, and noticed a sphere or circle that was and intense whit light,  the light made a cone that fanned out below the sphere, sort of like a spotlight that radiated down towards the ground, but not into the trees.  within this fan of light there was dust that glowed. the sphere remained the same intensity the whole time. the entire event lasted 20-25 seconds.  

1 i was outside my car in the driveway at the time.

2 the person i was with said you "look up in the sky!"

3. it was not an airplane or helichopter. it looked like a spot light looking for something.  no sound whatsoever.

4. pretty sure it was stationary, light pointing striaght down, but not to the ground. also the light adjusted 1-2 times sort of like focusing.  within the spotlight was a dust that was sparkling and luminating dust.  after thirty seonds or so it just diasappeared. but the dust was still lit up.
5.I have never seen anything as this before.  i had my camera phone in my hand, thinking i should film this, but for some reason i juts stood and starred til it disappeared.
6. i just disappeared.
content.summary: I looked up in the sky and we noticed a glowing sphere or white globe, it had a cone like light that fanned outword
